title: Londonderry Vase
artistDisplayName:
Sèvres Porcelain Manufactory (Sèvres, France, founded 1740)
Designed by Charles Percier (French, 1764–1838)
Decoration designed by Alexandre-Theodore Brogniart (French, 1739–1813)
Flowers and ornament painted by Gilbert Drouet (French, 1785–1825)
Birds painted by Christophe-Ferdinand Caron (French, active 1792–1815)
medium: Hard-paste porcelain, polychrome enamels, gilding, and gilt bronze mounts
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Harold L. Stewart and Harry and Maribel G. Blum endowment funds
